vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Public Utilities to enter into a professional services contract for Overall Engineering Services related to the City's water distribution system and related infrastructure with ms consultants, inc.; to authorize an amendment to the 2023 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize a transfer of cash and appropriation between projects within the Water Bond Fund; to authorize an expenditure of $1,000,000.00 from the Water Bond Fund for the contract; and to declare an emergency.  ($1,000,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Rob Dorans, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
